name: AR Laser for Cats
description:
Due to the technology of augmented reality, you can play with a cat all the time! A realistic and easy-to-learn cat game with a laser will give you a great mood, no matter where you play it: at home, at work or on the street. AR cat will always be near you.

Collect gold coins and open new cats and lasers. The more cats - the better! Choose your favorite pet and play with it!

* Cartoon graphics
* Game for all ages
* Simple but addictive cat game
* Large selection of cats
* No built-in payments - the game is free
